text: Baher El Mohamady (; born 1 November 1996), is an Egyptian footballer who plays for Egyptian Premier League side Ismaily and the Egyptian national team as a defender. El Mohamady is a player of the Ismaily youth system. He earned his first international cap against Niger on 8 September 2018.Baher El Mohamady - Footballdatabase ==International statistics== ===International=== :Statistics accurate as of match played 7 November 2019. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! colspan=3 | Egypt |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2018||4||1 |- |2019||4||0 |- !Total||8||1 |} :Egypt score listed first, score column indicates score after each El Mohamady goal. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="font-size:85%; text-align: left;" align=center |+ International goals by date, venue, cap, opponent, score, result and competition |- !scope=col|No. !scope=col data-sort-type=date|Date !scope=col|Venue !scope=col|Cap !scope=col|Opponent !scope=col|Score !scope=col|Result !scope=col|Competition |- !scope=row|1 |16 November 2018||Borg El Arab Stadium, Alexandria, Egypt||align=center|4||||align=center|2–1||align=center|3–2||2019 Africa Cup of Nations qualification |} ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ismailia Category:Egyptian footballers Category:Egypt international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Egyptian Premier League players Category:Ismaily SC players Category:Zamalek SC players Category:2019 Africa Cup of Nations players
